subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: One night after going 0 for 13 against Toronto, Vince Carter bounced back with 39 points, but the Nets still succumbed to the Bulls, 113-104.
snippet: One night after going 0 for 13 against Toronto, Vince Carter bounced back with 39 points, but the Nets still succumbed to the Bulls, 113-104.
